text: Join us as we dive into creating a custom at-current user decorator in Nest.js.
This decorator simplifies access to the current logged-in user within your module controllers.
You'll set up an interceptor to manage user data from Firebase Auth and modify the AuthGuard.
Plus, you'll learn to extract specific user properties using TypeScript types.
To enhance your Nest.js app with custom decorators, explore the full article for all the details.
